data.title: Office of Institutional Research
data.meta_description: Stakeholders across Wake Forest have frequent desire to compare the institution with data from other peers.  Given Wake’s size and complexity, the choice of which peer list to use often depends on the comparisons desired (e.g. comparisons of undergraduate only data or comparisons at the [...]
data.text:
Stakeholders across Wake Forest have frequent desire to compare the institution with data from other peers. Given Wake’s size and complexity, the choice of which peer list to use often depends on the comparisons desired (e.g. comparisons of undergraduate only data or comparisons at the university level). The following are frequently utilized, Wake Forest peer lists.

Lists Used for University-Level Comparisons:

IPEDS Comparison Group

The following institutions have been submitted by Wake Forest as a custom comparison group in the U.S. Department of Education’s Integrated Postsecondary Education Data System (IPEDS).

College of William and Mary

Dartmouth College

Davidson College

Duke University

Emory University

George Washington University

Tufts University

UNC Chapel Hill

University of Notre Dame

University of Richmond

University of Virginia

Vanderbilt University

Washington and Lee University

G14

G14 is a consortium of fourteen universities formed by the Provosts of the universities, and supported by the Institutional Research offices through data exchanges and information sharing.

Boston College

Boston University

Brandeis University

George Washington University

Lehigh University

New York University

Northeastern University

Southern Methodist University

Syracuse University

Tufts University

Tulane University

University of Miami

University of Notre Dame

University Senate Comparison Group

In 2019, a Wake Forest University Senate subcommittee used selected IPEDS institutional characteristics to create an algorithm which identified institutions most similar to Wake Forest resulting in the following list.

American University

Brandeis University

Brown University

Dartmouth College

Emory University

Lehigh University

Pepperdine University

Santa Clara University

Southern Methodist University

Tufts University

Tulane University of Louisiana

University of Miami

University of Notre Dame

University of Richmond

Vanderbilt University

Board of Trustees Academic Committee

Data from the following list of institutions is reviewed annually by the Wake Forest University Board of Trustees Academic Committee.

Boston College

Dartmouth College

Davidson College

Duke University

Emory University

Georgetown University

George Washington University

Rice University

Southern Methodist University

Tufts University

Tulane University of Louisiana

UNC Chapel Hill

University of Notre Dame

University of Richmond

University of Virginia

Vanderbilt University

Washington and Lee University

Lists Used for Undergraduate-Level Comparisons

Historic Undergraduate Cross Admit List

This lists institutions which have historically admitted undergraduate applicants who were also admitted to Wake Forest.

College of William and Mary

Davidson College

Duke University

Emory University

UNC Chapel Hill

University of Richmond

University of Virginia

Vanderbilt University

Washington and Lee University

Financial Aid Undergraduate Comparison Group

This list represents a group of highly ranked private colleges and universities with comparable undergraduate costs of attendance. Including cross-admit schools and schools with similar or higher levels of endowment per student, they are benchmarks for financial aid goal-setting related to increasing access for undergraduate students from diverse backgrounds.
